item.title: Nationwide Chicago Tea Parties
item.description: St. Louis Tea Party official event page The list of cities with Tea Party protests scheduled for this Friday, February 27, is growing by the minute. I wanted to point out some important links and facts. #TCOT and Patrick Leahy have done an outstanding job pulling this together in a very short time. [Facebook] Thanks to Bill Whittle and PJTV who are doing an top job of covering the events. (I’ll be a guest on Bill Whittle’s upcoming show.
